EventArgs(String[], String[]) - Constructor for class org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc.EventArgs
Converts the two specified arrays and uses the keys array as the keys for the parameters, and uses the values array as the values of the Strings of the keys array with the same index.

getKeySet() - Method in class org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc.EventArgs
Gets all the keys in this args set.
A common use of this would be:

for (String s : args.getKeySet()) {
someList.add(args.getParam(s));
}

 Which would add all the values in the args set to someList (or whatever list you replaced it with.)
getNick() - Method in class org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc.IRCBase
Gets the bot's current nick.
getParam(String) - Method in class org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc.EventArgs
Gets the parameter with the specified key.
getParamAsString(String) - Method in class org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc.EventArgs
Retrieves a event parameter as a String, using the Object.toString() method (so that it is more typesafe than casting to a String).

stringObjectArraysToStringObjectMap(String[], Object[]) - Static method in class org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc.BotUtils
Takes a String array and a Object array and outputs a Map of Strings (keys) and Objects.
The main use of this method is to convert arrays given as parameters to EventArgs.EventArgs(String[], String[])
to a HashMap (how event arguments are stored internally.)
